tags.name: oer-schema
tags.description:
`oer-schema`
`A LRN element to wrap an oer schema prefix onto materials.`

Attributes:

  * `related-resource` {`string`} - Related Resource ID

  * `_OERLink` - License link object for semantic meaning

  * `text` {`string`} - Text to wire into the middle of the element.
This is easier to manage then slotted data though
this supports both methods.

  * `oer-property` {`string`} - Property value for this oer resource

  * `typeof` {`string`} - Property value for this oer resource

Properties:

  * `relatedResource` {`string`} - Related Resource ID

  * `_OERLink` - License link object for semantic meaning

  * `text` {`string`} - Text to wire into the middle of the element.
This is easier to manage then slotted data though
this supports both methods.

  * `oerProperty` {`string`} - Property value for this oer resource

  * `typeof` {`string`} - Property value for this oer resource
